thread.section_title: StringsByMail.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StringsByMail.com | www.stringsbymail.com
thread.title: Sage Ahava

author: Sage Ahava
title: Sage Ahava
text: I waited a number of years before buying strings online as I crave the human experience. I searched everywhere for the specific strings I needed for my Manouche style guitar and couldn't find them locally. After easily finding and ordering my strings on the site, the strings came in quickly and inside the package was a signed note with a personal cell of someone I could call or TEXT with any questions. That's about as personal and interactive as it gets with online purchases. Well done y'all!
